roleset.name: Not presenting new info

roles.note: Unsure if all of these roles can occur with the negative polarity version, but are present for symmetry with reveal.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in Thyme, framed by Claire. Based on comparison to reveal-v.01.

example.text: She subsequently underwent a hematology evaluation which included ferritin levels that were normal and a bone marrow biopsy that-1 *T*-1 was unrevealing.
